name: Deck of Cards - Card Simulator
description:
A simple but beautiful app for when you need a virtual deck of playing cards.

Features:
• Simply tap anywhere to deal a new card
• Generate a deck with up to 216 randomly shuffled cards
• Easily see full deck history
• Jokers optional
• Simply shake your device for a new deck
• Automatically re-shuffle a new deck when the previous one is complete
• Simple, easy to use design
